sourcesContent: import React from "react"; class ShowImageText extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super (props) this.state = { text: "Copy" } } changeText = () => { this.setState({text: "Copied!"}) } render() { const imageText = this.props.text imageText = ```sdfasdfsadfsadfasdf dfsdfsdf sdfsdfsdf sdfsdfsdfsdfsdfsdf sdfsdf sdfsadf asdfsdf sdfasdf asdf sdf sdfasdf asdf sadf dsfsa dfas dfsdf sadf sdf sadf asdf sadf sdf sdf asdf sad fsad fsa df sadf s dfsdf sa df sadf sd fsa df sdfsdf ``` if (imageText) { return
